long.en:
Free Screen recorder for Windows PC, Mac, Chromebook and Linux

ğŸ”¥Our screen and audio recorder captures screen, webcamera, microphone and system sound, and autosaves recordings to your computer in MP4 format. 

â­ï¸Key Features 
Capture screen in three modes: whole desktop, separate window or chrome tab
Record screen with system sound, microphone, both of them or no audio at all.

Our Screen recorder extension is free, without watermark, limits and sign ups!

Looking for the best screen recorder for PC? Reasons to choose our Screen recorder:  
ğŸ¬ Record unlimited videos â€” all free, no sign ups!
ğŸš€ Recordings are automatically and instantly saved to your computer in MP4 format.
ğŸ¥ Record screen with audio from microphone and system sound.
ğŸ‘ Easy, compact and draggable interface â€” it saves your screen space in full screen mode
ğŸ›¡ï¸ We respect your privacy â€” you always know exactly what sources (video and audio) are being recorded, the extension does not collect or store any of your data.

ğŸ’¡ How to make a screen recording?
1. Install the extension by clicking the "Add to Chrome" button
2. Open a new browser page or reload the current page
3. Click the extension icon
4. Grant access to your microphone if you want to record your voice
5. Select video and audio sources in the pop-up dialog
6. Record your video
7. Once you click Stop, the recording will be automatically downloaded to your Downloads directory

â­ï¸Top Use cases
â–¸ Record simple tutorial videos: how to use any website or application.
â–¸ Save time when discussing a problem or bug: create steps to reproduce a video that helps the developer understand the context and find the problem.
â–¸ Capture system sound: recording system sound works for Chrome tab option, so you can share your game play with all the details.
â–¸ Eliminate work meetings in favor of more effective, asynchronous communication.

ğŸ”¥Ekstensi Chrome perekam layar - gratis, tanpa watermark dan tanpa proses pendaftaran!!!

ğŸ’¡ Tips Memulai Cepat

    Instal ekstensi dengan mengklik tombol "Tambahkan ke Chrome".
    Klik ikon ekstensi.
    Berikan akses ke mikrofon Anda jika Anda ingin merekam suara Anda.
    Pilih sumber video dan audio di dialog pop-up.
    Rekam video Anda.
    Jeda dan lanjutkan video saat diperlukan.
    Setelah Anda mengklik Berhenti, rekaman akan otomatis diunduh ke direktori Unduhan Anda.

â­ï¸Kasus Penggunaan Teratas

ğŸ”¥Estensione Chrome per registrare lo schermo - Ã¨ gratis, senza filigrana e senza processo di registrazione!!!

ğŸ’¡ Suggerimenti per un avvio rapido

    Installa l'estensione facendo clic sul pulsante "Aggiungi a Chrome".
    Fai clic sull'icona dell'estensione.
    Consenti l'accesso al microfono se desideri registrare la tua voce.
    Seleziona le fonti video e audio nel dialogo pop-up.
    Registra il tuo video.

â–¸ Elimina le riunioni di lavoro a favore di una comunicazione piÃ¹ efficace e asincrona.

ğŸ’¡ Snelle starttips

    Installeer de extensie door op de knop "Toevoegen aan Chrome" te klikken.
    Klik op het extensiepictogram.
    Geef toegang tot uw microfoon als u uw stem wilt opnemen.
    Selecteer video- en audio-bronnen in het pop-updialoogvenster.

    Chagua vyanzo vya video na sauti kwenye kisanduku cha mazungumzo kinachojitokeza.
